channel.title: Comments on: We are not necessarily Agile… but we are certainly agile!
channel.description: Plataformatec's place to talk about Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Elixir, and software engineering

item.title: By: DAXx85
item.dc:creator: DAXx85
item.description: One could put a life on prooving something to himself or the rest of the world, but, at the end of the day, time passes by and the only thing that matters after all is the real impact events and actions left on the surface of life. Be agile, keep it real and don't give a f*ck about titles and regalia. It's never worth it, especially when you know how to do reall stuff (software) that matters. So, keep it agile all day...
item.content:encoded: One could put a life on prooving something to himself or the rest of the world, but, at the end of the day, time passes by and the only thing that matters after all is the real impact events and actions left on the surface of life. Be agile, keep it real and don’t give a f*ck about titles and regalia. It’s never worth it, especially when you know how to do reall stuff (software) that matters. So, keep it agile all day…
